# Extensions Docs

## Compliance

- [Overview](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/extensions/compliance.md): Learn how to use compliance libraries to implement compliance features in .NET applications.
- [Data classification](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/extensions/data-classification.md): Learn how to use .NET data classification libraries to categorize your application's data.
- [Data redaction](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/extensions/data-redaction.md): Learn how to use .NET data redaction libraries to protect your application's sensitive data.

## Configuration

- [Overview](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/extensions/configuration.md): Learn how to use the Configuration API to configure .NET applications. Explore various inbuilt configuration providers.
- [Configuration providers](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/extensions/configuration-providers.md): Discover how to configure .NET apps using the configuration provider API and the available configuration providers.
- [Configuration source generation](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/extensions/configuration-generator.md): Learn how to use the configuration source generator to intercept specific call sites and bypass reflection-based configuration binding.
- [Implement a custom configuration provider](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/extensions/custom-configuration-provider.md): Learn how to implement a custom configuration provider in .NET apps. Explore a database configuration provider that uses Entity Framework Core.
- [Options pattern](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/extensions/options.md): Learn the options pattern to represent groups of related settings in .NET apps. The options pattern uses classes to provide strongly-typed access to settings.
- [Options validation source generation](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/extensions/options-validation-generator.md): Learn how to utilize compile-time source generation for validating options.
- [Options pattern guidance for library authors](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/extensions/options-library-authors.md): Learn how to expose the options pattern as a library author in .NET. Follow the guidance to ensure your library is correctly exposed to consumers.

## Create resource files

- [Overview](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/extensions/create-resource-files.md): Make resource files for .NET apps. Build text files with string resources, XML or binary files programmatically, or XML files with string, image, or object data.
- [Work with .resx files programmatically](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/extensions/work-with-resx-files-programmatically.md): Create or retrieve data from XML resource (.resx) files programmatically using types and members in the System.Resources namespace of the .NET Class Library.

## Culture-insensitive string operations

- [Overview](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/extensions/performing-culture-insensitive-string-operations.md): Learn more about: Performing culture-insensitive string operations
- [String comparisons](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/extensions/performing-culture-insensitive-string-comparisons.md): Learn how to perform culture-insensitive string comparisons
- [Case changes](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/extensions/performing-culture-insensitive-case-changes.md): Learn how to perform culture-insensitive case changes
- [String operations in collections](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/extensions/performing-culture-insensitive-string-operations-in-collections.md): Learn how to perform culture-insensitive string operations in collections.
- [String operations in arrays](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/extensions/performing-culture-insensitive-string-operations-in-arrays.md): Learn how to perform culture-insensitive string operations in arrays.

## Dependency injection

- [Overview](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/extensions/dependency-injection.md): Learn how to use dependency injection within your .NET apps. Discover how to registration services, define service lifetimes, and express dependencies in C#.
- [Dependency injection basics](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/extensions/dependency-injection-basics.md): Learn how to use dependency injection (DI) in your .NET apps with this simple example. Follow along with this pragmatic guide to understand DI basics in C#.
- [Use dependency injection](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/extensions/dependency-injection-usage.md): Learn how to use dependency injection in your .NET apps with this comprehensive tutorial. Follow along with this pragmatic guide to understand DI in C#.
- [Dependency injection guidelines](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/extensions/dependency-injection-guidelines.md): Discover effective dependency injection guidelines and best practices for developing .NET apps. Deepen your understanding of inversion of control.

## Globalization and localization

- [Overview](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/extensions/globalization-and-localization.md): Learn how to develop a world-ready application. Read about globalization, localizability review, and localization in .NET.
- [Globalization](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/extensions/globalization.md): Learn more about: Globalization
- [Globalization and ICU](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/extensions/globalization-icu.md): Learn more about: .NET globalization and ICU
- [Best practices for developing world-ready apps](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/extensions/best-practices-for-developing-world-ready-apps.md): Learn more about: Best practices for developing world-ready applications
- [Localizability review](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/extensions/localizability-review.md): Learn about localizability reviews, and when they should occur and how to use them.
- [Localization](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/extensions/localization.md): Learn the concepts of localization while learning how to use the IStringLocalizer and IStringLocalizerFactory implementations in your .NET workloads.

## HTTP
